    • Method Detail

      • showEmployeeOverview

        @RequestMapping(value="")
public java.lang.String showEmployeeOverview(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Adds a list of all the employees and all the skills stored in the database to the list.hmtl template model.
        Parameters:
        model - model that will be used by the list template. Instatiated by Spring's container
        Returns:
        redirects the user to the list template

      • showFilteredEmployeeOverview

        @RequestMapping(value="/filter",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String showFilteredEmployeeOverview(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> activeFilter,
                                                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> skills,
                                                                                                                     org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Adds a list of all the employees that have any of the skills requested by the user to the list.html template model. Also returns the list of skills used to filter the employees by and the complete list of skills to the view template.
        Parameters:
        activeFilter - set of Strings provided by the user to filter the employees by
        skills - set of Strings containing all the skills returned from the database
        model - model that will be used by the list template. Instatiated by Spring's container
        Returns:
        a filtered list of employees
